title: Several spells of light showers expected today
byline: Several spells of light showers will occur in the Western, Sabaragamuwa and North-western provinces and in the Nuwara-Eliya, Kandy, Galle and Matara districts today (04), the Department of Meteorology said.

title: Congress passes Trump’s ‘big, beautiful bill’ cutting taxes and spending
byline: The US Congress has passed Donald Trump’s sprawling tax and spending bill in a significant and hard-fought victory for the president and his domestic agenda.
